channel.title: Comments on: 10 Common Branding Mistakes You Must Avoid
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/10-common-branding-mistakes-you-must-avoid/#comment-677">MECLABS</a>.
The word, "Training" can vary wildly in meaning depending on the context where it is used. In this case, training means every process that is involved in imbibing the organization's culture, purpose, beliefs, and standard operating procedures in new staff members.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to MECLABS.

The word, “Training” can vary wildly in meaning depending on the context where it is used. In this case, training means every process that is involved in imbibing the organization’s culture, purpose, beliefs, and standard operating procedures in new staff members.

item.title: By: MECLABS
item.dc:creator: MECLABS
item.description: Great information. I definitely agree that not having clear values can cause value proposition danger. You mentioned that the staff is the greatest asset of every business. What types of training do you think should always be conducted?
item.content:encoded: Great information. I definitely agree that not having clear values can cause value proposition danger. You mentioned that the staff is the greatest asset of every business. What types of training do you think should always be conducted?

item.title: By: Mubarak
item.dc:creator: Mubarak
item.description: Another great article. It will be a good branding reference for both clients and designers, a very useful piece. Weldone and thank you!
item.content:encoded: Another great article. It will be a good branding reference for both clients and designers, a very useful piece. Weldone and thank you!
